name: A Relaxing Time At The Arcade
name_original: A Relaxing Time At The Arcade
description:
You are trapped in a retro arcade... but you are not alone... Your only chance of surviving is to find and beat each game!

A Relaxing Time At The Arcade is our Ludum Dare 41 jam submission. For the theme (Combine 2 Incompatible Genres), we pushed to combine Arcade Games with Survival Horror. This is the result.
